info.description:
This is a purely fictional larger style hospital. This building houses an emergency department, surgery, pathology, outpatient and other clinical facilities typically associated with purpose built hospitals.
This hospital provides a patient capacity of 32,000 and 6,100 civic jobs. It comes with two lots, a 10x10 with parking, and a 7x6 without parking which is more suitable for denser areas.
info.author: mattb325
